item.description:
Hey y'all! I've wanted to try this place out and needed to have my inaugural meet-up, when this deal came in my inbox. I think you have to sign-up for Groupon to get the deal.

From what I've heard, the space isn't huge so I've set the RSVP limit at 10.

http://www.groupon.co...

A good Southern restaurant isn't just the perfect place to practice close-up magic on unsuspecting patrons; it's also a great spot to meet friends and share Burton Gilliam gossip. Indulge yourself with today's Groupon: for $25, you get $50 worth of Southern fare at Tupelo, the Cambridge eatery that won a Best of Boston award from Boston Magazine in 2009.

www.tupelo02139.com


Hope you can join us!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the front and my picture is in my profile.
item.name: Dinner at Tupelo in Cambridge
